name: description
Iron: In allomancy, iron is conisdered an external, physical, pulling metal. Burning iron allows the user to see blue lines that point towards nearby sources of metal. Size and brightness scale proportionally to how close the user is to the metal. Additonally, the user can attempt to pull the metal source towards them: however, if the user is lighter, the user is pulled to the source instead. The pairing for iron is steel.
